descriptionHtml:
Jessica VanNord is a follower and is able to be married. She is Kevin VanNord's wife/follower who helps him in his journeys and watches him test out other mods that Cam and Seb has in stored for him. Jessica is a fierce warrior like Kevin and can not die. You can find Jessica in the Companions Guild in Whiterun

Install: Use Nexus or just drag files in Data folder.

Is compatible with UNPB and CBBE.

Known Issue (maybe): She may not appear in the Companions Guild in Whiterun, so upon entering wait 1-2 hours.


Required:
ApachiiSkyHair - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

Dawngaurd DLC

Dragonborn DLC

Credit:
ApachiiSkyHair - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
author: Wolfknight777
